# Docker images used by TestContainers in this project
# These images are cached to avoid Docker Hub rate limits
# Format: image:tag (one per line)

# Databases
postgres:16-alpine
postgres:17-alpine
mysql:8.0
cockroachdb/cockroach:v23.1.0
mongo:7.0

# Cache/Key-Value Stores
redis:7-alpine
memcached:1.6-alpine

# Redis Cluster
grokzen/redis-cluster:7.0.10
neohq/redis-cluster:latest

# Message Queues
rabbitmq:3.12-management-alpine
rabbitmq:3-management-alpine

# Development/Testing Services
axllent/mailpit:latest
localstack/localstack:latest
